backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing debate management, agent registry with enable/disable toggles, user profile management, file metadata storage, and access control integration with admin-only operations for agent initialization and status changes.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implementation of AgentRegistryTable component with dynamic agent data fetching, state management, table rendering, and toggle functionality mapped to specific test requirements (REQ-96 through REQ-99).
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing component functionality, including App.tsx with tabbed navigation, AgentRegistryTable with real-time status indicators and kill switches, and various hooks for debate operations and speech APIs.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH-based neutral grayscale color palette supporting light and dark modes for a tactical dark aesthetic technical infrastructure project.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for 'The Gang' application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component with three-tab navigation (boardroom/sensory/health), Internet Identity authentication, debate controls with push-to-talk and interrupt buttons, emergency mode indicators, and tactical dark UI theme.
frontend/src/components/AgentRegistryTab: Agent registry table component fetching agents from backend via useGetAgentStatuses hook, displaying dynamic rows with real-time status indicators (green/red), functional kill switch toggles using shadcn Switch, and comprehensive loading/error guard clauses.
frontend/src/components/DebateDisplay.ts: Displays live debate status with transcript, speaker info, and badges; triggers text-to-speech for Robby's responses only when user is authenticated, implementing a 'High-Stakes UI lock'.
Provides a button to interrupt/stop the debate by canceling active speech synthesis and calling the backend's abortDebate mutation.
frontend/src/components/PushToTalkButton: Implements a push-to-talk button using speech recognition; captures user speech and invokes a callback with the transcript when recognition completes.
frontend/src/components/SensoryCortexTab: Handles file upload (drag-and-drop, file input, camera) with chunking at 1.8MB per chunk; extracts file previews and routes documents to backend agents via the routeDocument mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication; creates anonymous or authenticated actors and initializes access control with an admin token from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for debate operations (start, abort, status polling), document routing, and agent status management, all using the backend actor.
Custom hook wrapping the Web Speech API for speech recognition; provides start/stop controls, transcript state, and error handling with browser compatibility checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: React hook that wraps the browser's SpeechSynthesis API to provide text-to-speech functionality with support for British male voice selection, speaking state management, and voice cancellation.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeWordStub.ts: Commented-out stub file for future integration of Picovoice Porcupine wake word detection to trigger speech recognition automatically.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme color schemes using OKLCH color space, including design tokens for borders, backgrounds, and chart colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/utils/transcriptParser.ts: Utility function that sanitizes transcript text by removing HTML table tags and converting URLs and markdown links into clickable anchor elements.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color tokens using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing The Gang multi-agent system architecture with 9 canisters on Internet Computer, including architectural constraints, known issues with Swarm Health dashboard, and existing feature implementations.
